it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.weapons

Class WeaponCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.Card
      • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.ActivableCard
        • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.weapons.WeaponCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Representable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlternateFireWeapon, Heatseeker, OptionalEffectsWeapon, Whisper

    public abstract class WeaponCard
extends ActivableCard
    Abstract class that defines the structure of a weapon card. Every subtype of weapon must extend this. The weapons are handled with the help of the Strategy Pattern. Each weapon has a predetermined number of "advancement steps", that represent the current state of advancement of the firing process of the weapon. Each time the controller wishes to continue the process of firing of the weapon, it must call the method **doActivationStep**; This will return a QuestionContainer that the controller must send to the Virtual View of the shooting player. The controller will need to reset() the weapon if it has finished firing. The method reset() will unload and reset the weapon to its original state.
    Author:
    Marchingegno
